content:
I do not have personal preferences but here are a few influential reggae artists that you should check out:

1. peter tosh - a founding member of the band the wailers and known for his songs with socially and politically conscious lyrics.

2. burning spear - a roots reggae artist known for his distinctive voice and his conscious lyrics that address social and political issues.

3. toots and the maytals - one of jamaica's most popular and influential ska and reggae groups.

4. lee "scratch" perry - a legendary record producer and artist who is credited with inventing dub music.

5. jimmy cliff - one of jamaica's most popular and influential musicians who helped popularize reggae music around the world.

6. bunny wailer - a founding member of the wailers and one of reggae's most important and influential artists.

7. dennis brown - a smooth-voiced reggae singer who recorded more than 75 albums during his career.

there are many other influential reggae artists, but these are just a few to get you started in exploring the diverse world of reggae music.
